titulo: 3-in-1 Bundle Easy Spanish Short Novels for Beginners (Novels 1-3): El faro del fin del mundo, El Principito & Don Quijote (Spanish Edition)
descripcion:
This 3-in-1 audiobook bundle includes the following three easy Spanish short noels for beginners with 60+ exercises & 200 word vocabularies: 
Volume 1: El Faro Del Fin Del Mundo by Jules Verne 
Volume 2: El Principito by Antoine de Saint-Exupery 
Volume 3: Don Quijote by Miguel de Cervantes 
Translated, edited, and simplified to aid reading practice and comprehension, each volume has simple wording, brief sentences, and moderate vocabulary, plus short and entertaining exercises. Written in easy Spanish for experienced beginners and low-intermediate students, each chapter is followed by a glossary of Spanish common words and popular expressions and their respective English translations, as well as by fun and simple exercises designed to increase your reading skills, comprehension, and vocabulary. Get this 3-in-1 audiobook bundle now and learn Spanish the fun and easy way!
